column4: hello,  i run resources administrator in windows the ram usage its at 900 mb (i got 1 GB) and 10% of processor usage, when i run ubuntu monitor it says 500 mb of ram usage and 80% of processor usage, WHY?
you can find out what's eating the processor by looking in the system monitor or from cli by using top
if you're running tweetdeck then you're also running adobeair .. that might be the culprit
